title: Riot, if you rework Poppy.
body:
Don't forget these major things to include in a champion, okay?

%Max HP True Damage, a dash every attack, also lots of mobility, wait did I say mobility, a three auto stack passive, mobility again, a self peel kit, and make sure that you make Poppy go bot lane as an ADC, we need to change the meta. Also, let Poppy have a double passive.

These ideas will make Poppy be the healthiest champion in the game!

replies.body:
I think you forgot an aoe stun that activates after 1.5 seconds and heals Poppy for 20% missing HP per enemy champ hit. Also, if she would heal over 100% missing HP, she gets a shield for the remaining duration that acts like a Thornmail for spells, which of course, does true damage. It doesnt just do true damage tho, it does (amount of damage a spell would have done) x (0.06/0.07/0.08/0.09/0.1) % HP true damage. So, if a spell would do 1000 damage against Poppy, she instead absorbs it and deals 1000 x 0.1 = 100% max HP true damage.
I think her W could spawn that "zone" when it gets activated.

Seriously tho, Im looking forward to that rework, I bet itll be cool. Hopefully.

"heals Poppy for 20% missing HP per enemy champ hit. Also, if she would heal over 100% missing HP"

I'm at least 8% sure that hitting all 5 champs will give you exactly 100% missing hp, and not more than that.
Yeah Spirit Visage increases healing and enemy clones (like Shaco or LB passive) count as champions too.
I'll admit I forgot Visage, but I thought the clone's no longer counted as champions, or it might be on a per case situation, to prevent things like Veigar gaining AP off killing a clone.
Idk if that changed, http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Pet at least says that the clones LB, Shaco and Wu are treated as normal champs.
